QuestData.Title: Pirate Party Crashers
QuestData.Description: Oh my gosh! Pirates!$B$B$n, there are Southsea pirates crashing your party!$B$BYou have to get in there and do something about this or your career, and any chance of you being the next Trade $G Prince : Princess;, is going to be ruined!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Pirate Party Crashers in order to save your career.
QuestData.CompletionText: Was that all of them? I know that I saw a lot rushing in!
QuestData.RewardText: Phew, that was close, boss. Unfortunately, I'm the bearer of more bad news.$B$BPlease don't shoot me....
